about_the_game:
THE PLOT


You meet a talking liquor bottle, Jin, who asks you to help him interrogate and catch criminals.
One after the other, you measure yourself against a series of unique, non-human characters with something to hide.
Where will this strange adventure bring you? And what is Jin's ultimate goal?

THE GAMEPLAY


You will fight and capture the criminals by interrogating them with the help of Jin's powers, in something known as... the Jinterrogation.
You will be hearing their testimonies and looking for keywords that will complete their confessions.

Each criminal, deep inside, feels guilty about what they have done, and your job is to make them face this reality by asking them questions and examining their answers. By the time you're done with them, you probably won't feel much pity for them... But learning more about their psyche is part of the fun.

THE LOOK


The four-color palette, low-res art, and chiptune music create the nostalgic look of something out of a retro game from the '90s.
None of the characters in DRINKRIME look like humans. It'll be a lot of fun conversing with animals, bottles, and the like.

GUIDELINES (Japanese)
